name: robosynthesis
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, a small group of the last robots are trying to bring back life to the surface - one plant at a time. 

Controls:

Mouse - Select and Adjust Mirrors 

 R - Restart Level 

[ - Previous Level

] - Skip Level

Credits: 

Code: Matan Shomer & Tal Koviazin

Art, Animation ans Sound: Eden Re'em & Carmel Lavon
